name: LXXV - Kita
description:
is part of XXIII-XII-LXXV / Saya-Kamu-Kita triptych, a visual poetry representing the emotional dynamics in a relationship.

Saya, Kamu, Kita, are words in Bahasa Indonesia that mean I, You, We, in English.

—
Images in the triptych are of a stairway in one boutique hotel in Jakarta, Indonesia, captured in a hurry on June 15, 2021 afternoon using iPhone 11 pro right before I left the building after viewing an art exhibition. 

—
The first five collectors who own both XXIII and XII will get LXXV for free to complete the triptych if they wish. Contact me via direct message for the airdrop.

jpeg
